definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)

sentences.english: In this semi-successional fermentation, a prolonged period of high rate daily gas production was maintained.
sentences.chinese: 半連續補料能維持較長時間的較高日產氣效率。

sentences.english: The monitoring system samples stack gas at a rate proportional to the stack gas volumetric flow rate.
sentences.chinese: 煙道氣樣品的監控系統速率成正比的煙氣體積流量。

sentences.english: However, aerogels tend to be extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 然而，氣凝膠往往非常易碎。

sentences.english: Fold proper air cap with bubble facing outer into the bottom of the box.
sentences.chinese: 對疊好適量的氣泡墊放入箱底，氣泡麪朝外。

sentences.english: You must use a gas having about 80 % of the higher range full scale value.
sentences.chinese: 你必須使用一路氣，滿足滿量程值80%的位置。

sentences.english: The content of radon gas and methane bacteria indicates obvious abnormity above the gas pool.
sentences.chinese: 氣田上方氡氣和甲烷菌的含量存在明顯的異常。

sentences.english: For air dry ink and coating applications, effectively hinder the skinning.
sentences.chinese: 用於氣乾性油墨與塗料，有效阻礙結皮。

sentences.english: Methane gas feeding panel complete with flowmeter with adjusting tap and pressure gauge.
sentences.chinese: 甲烷氣輸出板配有能調節活栓及壓力錶的流量計。

sentences.english: You try to keep all your commitments in your head and feel overwhelmed.
sentences.chinese: 你努力記住自己作出的所有允諾，感到喘不過氣。

sentences.english: Fred inflated the football with air.
sentences.chinese: 弗瑞德將足球打足了氣。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 discusses the numerical models of heavy gas dispersion.
sentences.chinese: 第三章爲重氣擴散過程的數值模擬模型。

sentences.english: Men, women, children - lives snuffed out in a few seconds.
sentences.chinese: 從男人到婦女再到兒童，數秒鐘之內就斷了氣。

sentences.english: The weather promises a good harvest.
sentences.chinese: 這天氣預兆着有好收成。

sentences.english: Fathers do not embitter your children, or they will become discouraged.
sentences.chinese: 你們做父親的，不要惹兒女的氣，恐怕他們失了志氣。

sentences.english: FY: I am not mad at you, I am not mad at anybody, it's just me.
sentences.chinese: 我沒有生你的氣，我誰也不怪，只怪我自己。

sentences.english: All these are properties of Qi.
sentences.chinese: 所有這些都是“氣”的特性。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
to feel/to become aware of/feeling/sense/perception/CL:個|个[ge4]
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
